sentences.sContent: It provides an alphabetic listing with controls to jump to a specific letter page in the contact list as shown in figure 13.
sentences.sContent_eng: It provides an alphabetic listing with controls to jump to a specific letter page in the contact list as shown in figure 13.
sentences.sCn: 它提供了一个带有控件的字母清单，可以跳到联系人页面中特定字母的页面，如图 13 所示。

sentences.sContent: Attribute names can include the same characters as element names, with similar rules for omitting spaces and starting names with alphabetic characters.
sentences.sContent_eng: Attribute names can include the same characters as element names, with similar rules for omitting spaces and starting names with alphabetic characters.
sentences.sCn: 属性名可以包含在元素名中使用的字符，规则也是类似的，即字符之间不能带有空格，名称只能以字母开始。

synos.tran: 字母的；[计]照字母次序的

phrases.pCn: 字母符号，字母字符；文字字符

words.tran: 字母的；[计] 依字母顺序的
